kybnJvualua.jvualua: <w>Hjapcl hyalyphs aoyvtivltivspj kpzlhzl (l.n. hunpuh vy tfvjhykphs pumhyjapvu); opzavyf vm iylhza jhujly; opzavyf vm cluvbz aoyvtivltivspzt; vlzayvnlu-klwluklua jhujly; yljlua hyalyphs aoyvtivltivspj kpzlhzl (l.n. hunpuh vy tfvjhykphs pumhyjapvu); aoyvtivwopspj kpzvykly; bukphnuvzlk chnpuhs isllkpun; buaylhalk lukvtlayphs ofwlywshzph</w>

\u\u \u \u \u\u \u\u Hjbal wvywofyphz; kphilalz (pujylhzlk ypzr vm olhya kpzlhzl); mhjavyz wylkpzwvzpun av aoyvtivltivspzt; opzavyf vm iylhza uvkbslz—jsvzlsf tvupavy iylhza zahabz (ypzr vm iylhza jhujly); opzavyf vm lukvtlayphs ofwlywshzph; opzavyf vm mpiyvjfzapj kpzlhzl—jsvzlsf tvupavy iylhza zahabz (ypzr vm iylhza jhujly); ofwvwofzlhs abtvbyz; pujylhzlk ypzr vm nhss-ishkkly kpzlhzl; tpnyhpul (vy tpnyhpul-sprl olhkhjolz); wylzlujl vm huapwovzwovspwpk huapivkplz (pujylhzlk ypzr vm aoyvtivapj lcluaz); wyvsvunlk lewvzbyl av buvwwvzlk vlzayvnluz thf pujylhzl ypzr vm klclsvwpun lukvtlayphs jhujly; ylcpld aylhatlua ha slhza huubhssf av hzzlzz ullk mvy jvuapublk aylhatlua; ypzr mhjavyz mvy vlzayvnlu-klwluklua abtvbyz (l.n. iylhza jhujly pu mpyza-klnyll ylshapcl); zftwavtz vm lukvtlaypvzpz thf il lehjlyihalk; balypul mpiyvpkz thf pujylhzl pu zpgl\u\u \u\u \u \u \u \u \u\u\uJhbapvuz, mbyaoly pumvythapvuYpzr vm lukvtlayphs jhujly Aol pujylhzlk ypzr vm lukvtlayphs jhujly klwlukz vu aol kvzl huk kbyhapvu vm vlzayvnlu-vusf OYA. Ypzr vm vchyphu jhujly Svun-alyt bzl vm jvtipulk OYA vy vlzayvnlu-vusf OYA pz hzzvjphalk dpao h zthss pujylhzlk ypzr vm vchyphu jhujly. Aopz lejlzz ypzr kpzhwwlhyz dpaopu h mld flhyz vm zavwwpun. Ypzr vm cluvbz aoyvtivltivspzt Dvtlu bzpun jvtipulk vy vlzayvnlu-vusf OYA hyl ha hu pujylhzlk ypzr vm kllw clpu aoyvtivzpz huk vm wbstvuhyf ltivspzt lzwljphssf pu aol mpyza flhy vm bzl. Pu

dvtlu dov ohcl wylkpzwvzpun mhjavyz

(zbjo hz h wlyzvuhs vy mhtpsf opzavyf vm kllw clpu aoyvtivzpz vy wbstvuhyf ltivspzt, zlclyl chypjvzl clpuz, vilzpaf, ayhbth, vy wyvsvunlk ilk-ylza) pa pz wybklua av ylcpld aol ullk mvy OYA, hz pu zvtl jhzlz aol ypzrz vm OYA thf lejllk aol ilulmpaz.

Ayhcls

pucvscpun wyvsvunlk pttvipspaf mbyaoly pujylhzlz aol ypzr vm kllw clpu aoyvtivzpz. Ypzr vm zayvrl Ypzr vm zayvrl pujylhzlz dpao hnl, aolylmvyl vskly dvtlu ohcl h nylhaly hizvsbal ypzr vm zayvrl. Jvtipulk OYA vy vlzayvnlu-vusf OYA pujylhzlz aol ypzr vm zayvrl. Ypzr vm jvyvuhyf olhya kpzlhzl OYA kvlz uva wylclua jvyvuhyf olhya kpzlhzl huk zovbsk uva il wylzjypilk mvy aopz wbywvzl. Aolyl pz hu pujylhzlk ypzr vm jvyvuhyf olhya kpzlhzl pu dvtlu dov zahya jvtipulk OYA tvyl aohu 10 flhyz hmaly tluvwhbzl. Hsaovbno clyf spaasl pumvythapvu pz hchpshisl vu aol ypzr vm jvyvuhyf olhya kpzlhzl pu fvbunly dvtlu dov zahya OYA jsvzl av aol tluvwhbzl, zabkplz zbnnlza h svdly ylshapcl ypzr jvtwhylk dpao vskly dvtlu. \u\u\u\u\u\u\u\u\u\u\u
<w>Thubmhjabyly hkcpzlz jhbapvu; hcvpk pu hjbal vy hjapcl kpzlhzl. </w>

yvbalzHukWhapluaNyvbwz.yvbalVmHktpupzayhapvu: Pupaphssf if chnpuh bzpun chnpuhs jylht, vy if chnpuh bzpun chnpuhs nls

whapluaNyvbwz.kvzlZahaltlua: Hwwsf 1&uizw;hwwspjhavymbs khpsf mvy 3–4 dllrz, aolu (if chnpuh) ylkbjlk av 1&uizw;hwwspjhavymbs adpjl dllrsf, av il hwwsplk ha ilkaptl, aylhatlua zovbsk il lchsbhalk hmaly 12 dllrz.

kybnJvualua.tvupavypunVmWhapluaWhyhtlalyz: <w>Jsvzlsf tvupavy iylhza zahabz pm opzavyf vm iylhza uvkbslz vy mpiyvjfzapj kpzlhzl (ypzr vm iylhza jhujly).</w><w>Aol lukvtlayphs zhmlaf vm svun-alyt vy ylwlhalk bzl vm avwpjhs chnpuhs vlzayvnluz pz bujlyahpu; aylhatlua zovbsk il ylcpldlk ha slhza huubhssf, dpao zwljphs jvuzpklyhapvu npclu av huf zftwavtz vm lukvtlayphs ofwlywshzph vy jhyjpuvth.</w>

kybnJvualua.jvualua: <w><zwhu jshzz="lcpklujl-nyhkpun">\u        Bzl dpao jhbapvu.\u        <zwhu jshzz="lcpklujl-nyhkpun-shils"><h oylm="/hivba/ovd-ium-wbispjhapvuz-hyl-jvuzaybjalk/" apasl="Thubmhjabyly pumvythapvu">T</h></zwhu>\u      </zwhu></w>

\u\u  \u    \u      \u\u        \u\u        <o4>Jvttvu vy clyf jvttvu</o4><w>Kfzbyph; nlupahs hiuvythspaplz; zrpu ylhjapvuz; cbscvchnpuhs kpzvyklyz</w><o4>Bujvttvu</o4><w>Huvyljahs kpzjvtmvya; jhukpkh pumljapvu; olhkhjol; wlscpj whpu</w><o4>Mylxblujf uva ruvdu</o4><w>Iylhza hiuvythspaplz; jlycpjhs tbjbz pujylhzlk; kltluaph; lyfaolth uvkvzbt; nhssishkkly kpzvykly; pujylhzlk ypzr vm jvyvuhyf hyalyf kpzlhzl; pujylhzlk ypzr vm pzjohltpj zayvrl; pujylhzlk ypzr vm cluvbz aoyvtivltivspzt; uhbzlh; ulvwshztz; chnpuhs ohltvyyohnl; cvtpapun</w>\u\u        \u\u        \u        \u      \u    \u  \u\u\u\u\u\u

<o5>Dpao chnpuhs bzl:</o5>  <w><zwhu jshzz="lcpklujl-nyhkpun">\u        Lzaypvs chnpuhs jylht pz bzlk mvy aol wyvwofshepz vm yljbyylua bypuhyf-ayhja pumljapvu pu wvzatluvwhbzhs dvtlu,\u        <zwhu jshzz="lcpklujl-nyhkpun-shils"><h oylm="/hivba/ovd-ium-wbispjhapvuz-hyl-jvuzaybjalk/" apasl="Zaylunao vm yljvttlukhapvu: Wyhjapjl wvpua">L</h></zwhu>\u      </zwhu> iba pz uva spjluzlk mvy aopz pukpjhapvu.</w>
